snippet: In addition to directing “Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory,” Mr. Stuart won three Emmy Awards as a producer or director of documentaries.
abstract: Mel Stuart, documentary filmmaker who also directed children's movie Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: In addition to directing “Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory,” Mr. Stuart won three Emmy Awards as a producer or director of documentaries.

headline.seo: Mel Stuart, ‘Willy Wonka’ Director, Dies at 83
headline.main: Mel Stuart, Documentarian and ‘Willy Wonka’ Director, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Mel Stuart, 83, Documentarian and ‘Willy Wonka’ Director
